text: (garaz) ibne yaameen rok lie gae to ye log kahane lage agar usane choree kee to (kaun taajjub hai) isake pahale isaka bhaee (yoosuph) choree kar chuka hai to yoosuph ne (usaka kuchh javaab na diya) usako apane dil mein posheeda (chhupaaye) rakha aur un par zaahir na hone diya magar ye kah diya ki tum log bade khaana kharaab (bure aadamee) ho
